authors.author: Henry Williams Baker John Mason Neale Marcus Aurel

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Of the Father's love begotten, newline Ere the world began to be; newline He is Alpha and Omega, newline He the source, the ending He. newline Of the things that are that have been newline And that future years shall see; newline Evermore and evermore!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O, ye heights of heaven adore Him, newline Angel hosts; His praises sing; newline Pow'rs, dominions, bow before Him newline And extol our God and King; newline Let no tongue on earth be silent, newline Ev'ry voice in concert ring; newline Evermore and evermore!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Christ, to Thee with God the Father, newline And, O Holy Ghost, to Thee; newline Hymn and chant and high thanksgiving newline And unwearied praises be: newline Honor, glory, and dominion and eternal victory; newline Evermore and evermore! newline Amen.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O that birth forever blessed newline When the Virgin, full of grace, newline By the Holy Ghost conceiving, newline Bare the Savior of our race; newline And the Babe, the world's Redeemer newline First revealed His sacred face, newline Evermore and evermore!
